body:
Features and Enhancements

Radius Search
  • Zip radius search option is now available in Compare Networks.
    • When searching by radius in Compare Networks, zip radius is used.
    • Network strength quadrant is not clickable when using radius search.
    • Links to provider Detail Results are disabled when only one zip code is in the criteria.

Issues Fixed

Population files
  • Fixed an issue where built Population File (using counties) does not match counts with using the actual counties counts
